system.description: When you start a short rest, you can choose a topic to study from the library, browsing through its spectral volumes. You have disadvantage on all Perception checks while studying from the library. When you finish your long rest, you may make a single Arcana, Culture, Engineering, History, or Nature check with advantage. If you succeed on your check, the next attack you make against a creature of the corresponding type (see below) is made with advantage.

source.name: Thematic Toolkit: Judge, Jury, and Executioner
